description:
CID is a design center where doing and know-how are coordinated.
Training is provided with a focus on helping design and advertising professionals who seek to improve and complement their personal skills.
We also develop and solve projects in various branches of design such as graphic design, industrial design, architectural design, and interiors, as well as web, video, photography, and product developments in our advertising agency, to cover the needs of our clients in an integral, creative and innovative way.
